author: cnbc.com
title: PCM to Release Q4 2017 Results March 7, 2018
text:
EL SEGUNDO, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- PCM, Inc. (NASDAQ:PCMI), a leading technology solutions provider, announced that it will release its fourth quarter results on March 7, 2018 after the market closes. Management will discuss the fourth quarter results during a conference call to be held on Wednesday March 7, 2018, at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time (1:30 p.m. Pacific Time).
This conference call will be webcast by NASDAQ OMX. The conference call will be available to the general public on the live webcast in a listen-only mode and can be accessed by going to PCM's website at http://investor.pcm.com/events.com .
The webcast will be archived and can be accessed at http://investor.pcm.com under “Events & Presentations.” A replay of the conference call by phone will be available from 7:30 p.m. ET on March 7, 2018 until March 14, 2018. The dial-in number for the replay is (855) 859-2056 or (404) 537-3406 and the pass code is 4796989.
About PCM
PCM, Inc., through its wholly-owned subsidiaries, is a leading multi-vendor provider of technology solutions, including hardware, software and services to small, medium and enterprise businesses, state, local and federal governments and educational institutions across the United States, Canada and the UK. We generated net sales of $2.2 billion in the twelve months ended September 2017. For more information, please visit investor.pcm.com or call (310) 354-5600.
